description: Draws geometric shapes no indicators for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for draw_geometric_shapes_no_indicators
result = draw_geometric_shapes_no_indicators(data)

educational_standards.description: Identify quadrilaterals —including rhombuses, rectangles, squares, and parallelograms—by analyzing visible attributes such as number of sides, right angles, and equal-length sides.
Recognize and describe basic geometric features: edges, vertices, parallel sides, and right angles.
Draw examples of quadrilaterals that do not fit into the subcategories of rhombuses, rectangles, or squares.
Select all names for a quadrilateral.
